item.description:
New York Times bestselling author of nine books Dr. Thomas E. Woods, Jr. will be joining Republican Liberty Caucus supporters in New Hampshire on November 7. Woods holds a bachelor's degree in history from Harvard and a master's, M.Phil., and Ph.D. from Columbia University.

http://www.thomasewoo...

Dr. Woods' most recent book, Meltdown, does an outstanding job describing why the economy collapsed, and the Federal Reserve's role in the collapse. He also recently testified in front of Congress in support of Ron Paul's bill to audit the Fed.

Additionally, the event will have Larry Lepard, a highly successful investment fund manager who will speak on his perspectives on the economic meltdown, including advice on how to protect your investments.

All proceeds will go to support the election of pro-liberty candidates to the NH House and Senate.

Send your friends an Invitation.
Exercise your individual liberty. Come dressed as you please.

http://www.jimforsyth...
item.name: Dr. Tom Woods in New Hampshire
